title: Negative Body Image and Neverland (w/ Joe DeRosa & Shane Gillis)
description: Joe DeRosa joins Jay in Los Angeles and they discuss leaving on shirts while being intimate. The documentary "Leaving Neverland" is at the top of everyone's mind and back on the cruise Dan, Jay & Christine talk about beach bodies.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
